title: Why Your Friends Are WRONG About Dating
description:
Learn how to go from “Hi” to a first date seamlessly in James’ step-by-step guide: https://tnl.life/4662gMd

**🚀** Want to get coached by the TNL team? Book a free consultation call: https://tnl.life/coachinginquiry

🗓️ Check when TNL is coming to your city. Workshop schedule: https://tnl.life/coachingschedule

~ About The Natural Lifestyles ~
The Natural Lifestyles is the leading elite dating company on the planet. We give dating advice to guys for over a decade with phenomenal results. Our live workshops in New York, Barcelona, Melbourne, Sydney, Budapest etc. are highly requested and offer a life changing experience! Only around 80 guys can be taught live each year.

Do you want to step out of your fear and start a new life? Check our website for more info:

channel_info.title: The Natural Lifestyles
channel_info.description: James Marshall, Shae Matthews, Alex León, & Virag Tierra bring you dating videos on how to be natural with women, improve your confidence and go for what you want in life.

transcription: It's not your job to maintain the self-image that other people are trying to put you in because they're afraid of what you might be if they didn't keep you small. I only want to see really clear signals that someone is interested. Alright, well we're going to be forcing you to take that chance from tomorrow. Well, I want to congratulate you, man, because I can see that it's a very strong thing for you and it's a strong thing for everybody here, but I can tell that your heart's really invested in this process, which is powerful and important. And we all need to also recognise that we are somewhat of a product of our environment, in the way people treat us, they judge us, the way they tell us who we are, etc. And in our more vulnerable moments, we take that as truth. We start to believe that what people say is true, especially when it's a girlfriend or a family member or somebody that we project some authority onto and then they're saying or projecting some kind of, you know, either direct or indirect kind of projection. It can have a big effect. So, yeah, you're in the right place, man, 100%.
